title: "What is open data"? - Video production commission

details.excerpt: The ODI and Partnership for Open Data are putting out to tender the production of a short video that explains "What is open data"?
details.content:
The ODI and Partnership for Open Data are putting out to tender the production of a short video that explains "What is open data"?

The aim of this video is to address what open data is, who publishes it and what can be achieved with it. This should be conveyed through the telling of international open data success stories, that inform and educate people about the potential of open data to act as a catalyst for change and growth.

A full brief can be found here.

Pitches with a list of links to previous work should be made to Kathryn Corrick, Head of Content & Learning at the ODI, no later than 6pm, BST, 22 September, 2014.
